name: CampylobacteriosisTestsForCampylobacterSpeciesNucleicAcid
title: Campylobacteriosis (Tests for Campylobacter species Nucleic Acid)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for lab test names to detect nucleic acid of Campylobacter),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify laboratory tests names),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Campylobacter nucleic acid; plus "	
Microorganism identified [Type] in Stool by NAA with probe detection"),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
